homePage.description: Use our interactive map to find out how people in England and Wales answered Census 2021 questions about themselves, their health and how they live and work.

topicsPage.serviceTitle: Select a topic to explore census results for

locationOverview.title: Explore {selectedGeographyDisplayName}
locationOverview.content: The 2021 Census tells us a lot about how people in {selectedGeographyDisplayName} live and work.

topicList.title: Select a topic
topicList.description: We have grouped census information into topics, categories and subjects to help you find what you are looking for.
